General.Name: Skardin Industrial
General.Description: Skardin Industrial Corporation, a consumer electronics manufacturing company, manufactures, supplies, and exports set top box and broadband industry solutions in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers STB platforms, smart home products, WIFI speakers, hybrid sound bars, audio extenders, and software/middleware products. It also provides electronics manufacturing services. Skardin Industrial Corporation was founded in 1982 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 123-1, Hsing De Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
